column5: 1/1 for me on the muskie opener... really tough bite, pretty windy and tons of traffic on the water (fishing and otherwise). Didn't even have any follows today. Didn't start fishing till 2:30pm, so I really shouldn't complain. Thank god the wifey was along - I forgot my OFC sign, had to write it on the boat seat with a combination of her lipstick and mascara LMAO!!!  35" added for Team One... to be upgraded shortly...
Awesome fish man!!  I saw a few guys out today tossing big blades but didn't see any fish landed.  The lake I was fishing has some monsters but they are few and far between.
Nice clean looking fish! I'm going Monday. Hopefully there are some Skis left for me to catch!

Hey Clive... I got her on one of your creations... orange blade, orange tail. Same one that Al got his 42" on last fall. Johnny - that big girl we saw the other day is still out there waiting for you, get that rattly little silver lure out and bring her in!
